description: Pack this nutritionally approved brown rice salad for your next outdoor adventure with the kids. It's full of veg and flavoured with a zesty dressing.
keywords: Rice salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Nov 2021,Sesame free,Quick & easy,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Rice,Vegan,Picnic,Tomato,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Veggie Rice Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tsp Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
1 Lebanese cucumber, halved lengthways, thinly sliced
100g snow peas, trimmed, thinly sliced lengthways
0.5 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place lemon juice and oil in a large bowl and whisk to combine. Season with pepper. Add rice, onion, tomato, cucumber, snow peas, parsley and pepitas, then toss to combine.
Divide rice salad among 2 airtight containers. Cover with lids and keep chilled until ready to serve.
